Support tag¶

  • <!-- name -->
  • vm-val="var"
  • vm-html="var"
  • vm-text="var"
  • vm-if="expr"
  • vm-foreach="Object|Array"
  • vm-show="expr"
  • vm-class="expr"
  • vm-css="expr"
  • vm-attr="var"
  • vm-on="(click, fn)"
  • ...
